1.title: Like Father Like Son
1.plot: Lou Tuminaro has a new load of guns and deadlines to meet to ship them out. It's all hands on deck as everyone tries to meet Lou's expectations about how they get it done. Little Louie gets a job and learns he's a lot like his dad.

2.title: Tulsa Bound
2.plot: Lou Tuminaro, Pops and Little Louie bond when three generations go to one of the biggest gun shows in the world, the Wanenmacher Show in Tulsa. Theresa proves she can be left in charge of the store.

3.title: Little Louie's Big Day
3.plot: Lou Tuminaro, Pops and Little Louie are at one of the biggest gun shows. Little Louie shows them how to find the gems and gets a 10/22 of his own in return. Theresa redecorates the gun shop and surprises Lou with a 'shop dog'.

4.title: Weekend with Pops
4.plot: Pops invites Lou and Theresa for a couple's weekend to celebrate his birthday. How much will it cost him as Pops sets his sights on an engraved set of pistols? Little Louie learns some shop lessons from Derek and makes his dad proud.

5.title: Glee and the Pythons
5.plot: Lou bought four Snakes from Glee and her husband at a gun show. When they come to town for a visit, Lou and Theresa show off the improvements to the one remaining gun and surprise Glee with a healthy dose of Montana hospitality.

6.title: The Devil's in the Details
6.plot: Lou's attention to detail is his strength and his Achilles' heel. Working on a Winchester 70 for an expert client, Lou discovers that the perfection that drives him, and everyone else in the family nuts, also drives his success.

7.title: Pop's New Pal
7.plot: When Pop's new friend Patrick comes to Montana for a visit, Lou gains a new appreciation for the man who raised him, taught him about guns and has proved to be the catalyst for Lou's success.

8.title: Hand Crafted
8.plot: When Lou stops in at the Darby watering hole to hang with the locals, he gets an idea how he can promote the business. While he works through it, Derek takes Theresa and Lou on a tour of the valley so Pops can learn to use his digital camera.

9.title: Little Louie's Ruger
9.plot: The Tuminaro family traditions are passed down when Lou helps Little Louie start working on his new 10/22. Theresa's favorite charity gets a boost and the boys face a little completion when Pop's friend Patrick and his son come to town for a visit.

10.title: Lou Is Blowing Up
10.plot: Hard work and dedication pay off for the Tuminaro's when a shotgun company drops in to see if Lou's shop is right for their brand.

1.title: Meet the Tuminaros
1.plot: Lou Tuminaro drags his wife, kids and his Pops to Montana to buy and sell guns. Cultures often collide for this New Yorker.

2.title: Trading Up
2.plot: Small town gun shows bring out the characters. Lou's perfectionism clashes with the culture as he learns to value his new home and his family.

3.title: Fathers and Sons
3.plot: Passing along tradition is big in the gun world. Lou comes to grips with his own Father/Son relationships as he creates the perfect Father/Son moment for his client.

4.title: Clear Presents of Mine
4.plot: Lou's wife T Bone steps up and makes her presence know in Lou's world. He learns what it means to have a rock star for a partner.

5.title: Breathe, Baby, Breathe
5.plot: The big gun shows up at the store, and selling it winds Lou up to the breaking point. His wife, T-Bone, says Lou has to find a way to calm down. Lou finds out what therapy he really needs.

6.title: Separation Anxiety
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Faith, Hope and Charity
7.plot: Times are tough as Lou and family meet bikers, the town, and a cowboy in the search for collectable guns. Lou learns what it means to do the right thing, give back, and have a little faith.

imdb.plot outline: Louie Tuminaro's dream was always to open the greatest gun shop in the west. So he sold everything and moved his family across the country, from the Big Apple to the small town of Hamilton, Montana, to make his dream a reality. Tune in to see what happens along the way as Tuminaro tries to balance business, family and small town living, and of course, make the sale.
imdb.title: The Gunfather
plot: Louie Tuminaro's dream was always to open the greatest gun shop in the west. So he sold everything and moved his family across the country, from the Big Apple to the small town of Hamilton, Montana, to make his dream a reality. Tune in to see what happens along the way as Tuminaro tries to balance business, family and small town living, and of course, make the sale.
